::Firearm::

Firearm looks Spears over, sighing. He couldn't really bring himself 
to tell her that it was probably impossible.

"There is always a chance," he says, "Even if they cleared his 
memory, we might be able to restore it."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> She turned and looked at Firearm. "Tell me honestly, is there any 
> chance we can get him back?" She felt a slight glimmer of hope 
start 
> to light up in her spark.
